title: TMC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Nurse II Posts
description: The Tata Memorial Centre (TMC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Nurse II Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the GNM, B.Sc Nursing can grab this chance and apply for the TMC Recruitment 2025 . Here we provided more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. If you are looking ...
